Dashboard.description: Manages the server dashboard and its settings.

FileBrowser.description: Provides file management capabilities for the server.

Terminal.description: Provides terminal access to the server.

RCONTerminal.description: Manages RCON terminal access for server control.

DiscordWebhooks.description: Handles Discord webhook integrations for notifications.

ThemeManager.description: Manages themes for the server dashboard.

ModuleManager.description: Handles enabling and disabling of server modules.

AutoScheduler.description: Schedules automated tasks for the server.

AuditLog.description: Tracks server actions and logs them for auditing purposes.

Plugin.description: Manages server plugins and their configurations.

AutoUpdater.description: Automatically updates server software and configurations.

SteamWorkshop.description: Integrates Steam Workshop for managing mods and assets.

LoggingModule.description: Handles logging for server events and errors.

RBACModule.description: Manages role-based access control for server users.

AuditLoggerModule.description: Logs detailed audit information for server actions.

LoginAuthModule.description: Handles login and authentication for server users.
